DOC.brief_summary: This research study determine hypofractionated image guide radiation therapy ( hypoIGRT ) proton therapy good way treat early stage lung tumor patient surgery . HypoIGRT deliver high daily dos radiation short period time compare conventional radiation . This think deliver lethal dose radiation tumor convenient treatment complete within 2-3 week compare typical 7-8 week course conventional radiotherapy .
DOC.brief_title: Proton Therapy Stage I Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer ( LU03 )
DOC.criteria: Pathologically confirm , biopsy cytology , nonsmall cell lung carcinoma diagnose within 3 month prior study enrollment . T1 , N0 , M0 T2 , N0 , M0 . At least 18 year old time consent . Adequate bone marrow function . Medically inoperable . Medically operable candidate allow refuse surgical resection . If patient large pleural effusion , must biopsy negative . Evidence distant metastasis ( M1 ) and/or nodal involvement ( N1 , N2 , N3 ) . Synchronous primary . T2 tumor > 5 cm ; T3 , T4 primary tumor . Previous radiotherapy lung cancer . Concomitant local , regional , and/or systemic therapy radiotherapy . Active systemic , pulmonary , and/or pericardial infection .
DOC.keyword: Stage I Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer
